meta.title: Services | Kris French Web Development
meta.description: Web development services including custom site builds, hosting, and ongoing maintenance for local businesses in the Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura area.

intro.heading: Helping Your Business Succeed Online
intro.body: I provide end-to-end website solutions, from design and development to hosting and maintenance, so you can focus on running your business.

servicesList.title: Custom Website Builds
servicesList.description: Responsive, modern websites tailored to your brand and business needs, with bilingual support for English and Japanese.

servicesList.title: Website Hosting
servicesList.description: Reliable hosting with fast load times, secure connections, and regular backups to keep your site running smoothly.

servicesList.title: Ongoing Maintenance
servicesList.description: Monthly updates, security checks, and performance monitoring to ensure your site stays fast, safe, and up to date.
